summary: Ibrahim, a 14-year-old Moroccan boy, walks down a road in the outskirts of a big city alone and disoriented. Recently informed that he will be deported in two days, he packed his belongings and ran away. He is now alone with no place to go.
cast: Germán Alcarazu|Adil Koukouh|Joseba Ugalde|Moussa Echarif|Ana Wagener|Álex Angulo|Eder Pastor|Mansour Zakhnini|Khalid Chiyar|Garazi Navarro|Ramón Agirre|Itziar Lazkano|Sara Cozar|Reyes Moleres|Elena Irureta|Justi Larrinaga|Hamdi Kousairy|Oier Tariku Cano|Aitor Beltrán|Iratxe Hernández|Juan Manuel Rodríguez|Jon Gómez|Mikel Somiñana|Oier Astorizka|Gorka Cabreras|Adrián Mata|Gontzal Lobato|Ismael Ruiz|Liviu George|Oier Trevilla|Garikoitz Uribesalgo|Salmane Fana|Jamal Addoui|Youssef Ait|Nabil Assan|Mustapha El Jadydy|Abderraman Otane|Younes Bakkas|Mohamed Khouyaoui|Asian Ben Said|Mohamed Said|Ayoub Debhi|Mobarel Ouamou|Youssef Bel Hadi|Alejandra Navarro|Yasmina Dos Santos|Zuriñe Lopez|Verónica Pedrueza|Joel Vázquez|Asier Robles|Jorge Pelaz|Iñigo Meca|Egoi Sas|Ibai Zaitegui|Imanol Torres|Garikoitz Manchado|Patxo Telleria|Emilian Dandu|Alberto Castro|Beñat López|Xabi Fernández|Javi Alaiza
title: A escondidas
